tool.name: Split.groups
tool.description: Generates a fasta file for each group
tool.command:
echo 'split.groups( #if $name: name=$name, #end if #if $groups: groups=${ str($groups).replace(",","-") }, #end if #if $count: count=$count, #end if fasta=$fasta, group=$group )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$fasta" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.fasta .

param.name: fasta
param.label: fasta - Fasta to split by group

param.name: name
param.label: name - Names to split by group

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The split.groups_ command reads a fasta file and group_ file and generates a fasta file for each group in the groupfile. A name_ file can also be split into groups.
.. _group: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Group_file .. _name: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Name_file .. _split.groups: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Split.groups
